title: [1.7.10][SSP/SMP]恒星能膨胀-给你的TE加上一块太阳能电池板吧！
author: -木羽-
txt_content:
本帖最后由 我的蛋蛋 于 2016-1-16 10:34 编辑 

简介
Solar Expansion is an addon to Thermal Expansion which adds a bunch of Solar Panels. There are two versions of Solar Expansion the "Basic" and the "Editable" (for normal users and for modpack/map creators)
恒星能膨胀是一个加入了一大堆大堆大堆太阳能板的热力膨胀的附属Mod。恒星能膨胀有两种版本：基础版和可编辑版(给普通玩家和给整合包/地图制作者)图片

恒星能膨胀一共有六个等级：铅石、强化、红石、谐振、高级和终极详细
每一等级的电池板都有一个对应的头盔，两者之间属性一样
铅石：正常输出1RF/T 移动输出2RF/T
强化：正常输出8RF/T 移动输出16RF/T
红石：正常输出64RF/T 移动输出128RF/T
谐振：正常输出512RF/T 移动输出1024RF/T
高级：正常输出4096EF/T 移动输出8192RF/T
终极：正常输出32768RF/T 移动输出65536RF/T
能储存的能量都是正常输出的一千倍更新日志
Solar Expansion 1.2c
- Updated to the latest version of COFH API.

Solar Expansion 1.2f
- Fixed some bugs.
- Fixed all API related issues so that now you can use Solar Expansion with both new and old versions of COFH API.
- Changed dependency from Thermal Expansion to Thermal Foundation

Solar Expansion 1.3a
- Added Shift-Click to remove Solar Panel and store the energy.
(feature request by Reaperguy666)
- Changed a lot of recipes.

Solar Expansion 1.3b
- Added much better language localization support.
(inspired by some things in Modular Armor code)
- Added ru_RU.lang
(by me)

Solar Expansion 1.4c
- Changed some .lang stuff (again)
- Added the costume models I promised before I stopped
- Cleaned up some code
- There were 1.4a and 1.4b but both of them didn't pass testing
特别感谢
Jordsta95帮助开发ModCOFH团队的APIMinecraft Forge和FML 团队使Mod开发成为可能Mojang的MinecraftTedTheRusSB624的恒星能膨胀
